attributes.additional_details:
What Eddie Howe has done at AFC Bournemouth to take them from the near brink of destruction to one of the best in europe is exactly what the UK needs. 

Make a difference put Eddie in charge
attributes.background: It seems there is a lack of leadership within government from all parties, MPs willing to vote for deals just for a PM to resign in the hope of taking control.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
